thread.title: 791Tech Joins Forces with Renowned Cyber Security Thought Leader Michael Iseyemi
thread.title_full: 791Tech Joins Forces with Renowned Cyber Security Thought Leader Michael Iseyemi - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: 791Tech Joins Forces with Renowned Cyber Security Thought Leader Michael Iseyemi
text:
791 Technologies Limited adds distinguished industry leader Michael Iseyemi to leadership team.
791 Technologies Limited CEO Geoff Davidson is pleased to announce that Michael Iseyemi has accepted the role of Chief Security Officer, “Mr. Iseyemi has earned worldwide respect and reputation for his unrivaled and unique expertise in Technology, Cyber Security, Identity Theft Protection, Risk Management, Personal Privacy Practices and Online Safety.”
Mr. Iseyemi is a founding member of the PCI Security Standards Council and the former Global Chief Information Security & Risk Officer, Minacs Group Inc.. He is a staunch advocate of advancing online and personal data security for everyone and is a highly sought after presenter and panel member at industry events including the upcoming 2015 Toronto CIO Executive Leadership Summit on October 27th for the panel addressing The Challenge of Enterprise Security Today and Into the Future.
“As our CSO, Michael’s thoughtful leadership across all these areas will help 791Tech to accelerate our efforts to continuously improve the protection, accessibility and reliability our clients and partners trust us to be at the forefront of delivering with all our offerings.”
“There is a global crisis of security breaches threatening the safety, security and the private identities of every consumer and business in the world. Mr. Iseyemi is uniquely qualified to ensure that our current and future technology platforms and capabilities meet, exceed or set the standards for Industry Best Practice through rigorous design and relentless testing and certification.” As part of Michael's mandate, he will lead 791Technology in ensuring that the Mean Time To Compromise (MTTC) e-commerce portals or Technology products is significantly enhanced."
For more information on 791 Technologies Limited, please visit http://www.791Tech.com or contact Mr. Jean Hervieux, Chief Business Development Officer at jhervieux(at)791tech(dot)com.
For more information on Mr. Iseyemi’s participation in the upcoming CIO Executive Leadership Summit and the other events and distinguished speakers, please visit: ( http://www.hmgstrategy.com/events/home.asp?eventID=89 ).
 //www.prweb.com/releases/2015/10_791TechRelease/prweb13014949.htm
